4.gl: to make an alliance with someone else

H1735.def: = man; ◄ from {L:Mareshah<SDBH:מָרֵשָׁה>}; ► father of a {L:prophet<SDBH:נָבִיא>} named {L:Eliezer<SDBH:אֱלִיעֶזֶר>}; in the time of king {L:Jehoshaphat<SDBH:יְהֹושָׁפָט>}

H4762.def: = town; ◄ located in the {L:foothills<SDBH:שְׁפֵלָה>}; territory of {L:Judah<SDBH:יְהוּדָה>}

H5012.def: = action by which humans speak or act as a prophet

H3092.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahilud<SDBH:אֲחִילוּד>}; ► recorder; time of king {L:David<SDBH:דָּוִד>}

H559.def: = action by which humans and deities utter words; this can happen within their minds and be inaudible to others, but in most cases the words are spoken out loud in order to communicate something to others; usually directly followed by the actual words that are spoken

H2266.def: = state in which two or more inanimate objects are joined together

H274.def: = man; ◄ son of {L:Ahab<SDBH:אַחְאָב>}; ► king of northern kingdom of {L:Israel<SDBH:יִשְׂרָאֵל>}

H3068.def: = deity; ► God of Israel who revealed himself to Moses

H853.def: exact meaning unknown; possibly: = wooden handle with an iron head that has both an adze and a chisel as its ends; ► used for breaking up moderately hard soil to make it ready for cultivation

H6555.def: = process by which a container bursts open due to abundance of contents

H4639.def: = an activity performed by a person or deity

H591.def: = boat ◄ of a relatively large size ► that is able to sail the sea or ocean

H6113.def: = action by which someone slows down or stops moving forward entirely

H1980.def: = process by which liquids or other inanimate objects move from one place to another

H8659.def: = (semi-)precious stone, possibly kind of beryl, which is colorless in its pure form

26.gl: to make an alliance with someone else
